Content.Text:
<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
H-Hey! Wait a moment!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Quick, <MYNAME>. Grab her!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh brother! You've got the reactions of
a geriatric! So slow!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
And you call yourself a farmer? I can't
believe you!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
...Okay, that was going too far. It's my
fault for letting her get away from me
to start with.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I guess it might be asking a lot, but do
you think you could help me catch her
again?
I'll help
I've got to get home

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Great, let's get going. She ran off
toward the mountain peak. Let's go
after her.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So tell me, why're you helping me?
<PAGE>
I'm sorry for being so nasty to you back
there. Yet you still agreed to come
along with me?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It isn't like its your cow, either.
<PAGE>
So why would you help me so easily?
That's just how things worked out
Because I like you, Neil

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Y-Yeah, I guess there's nothing special
behind it. You don't need to come any
further, I'll take it from here.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Don't worry! See you later!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? You like me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>What are you, soft in the head? Why
would you say something like that here?
Don't mess about with me!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey, what're you doing?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>You're going to help me? Come on then!
We're going to get left behind!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, there she is. You take the left,
I'll take the right.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Go!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great! Got her!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, thank you. You really helped me
out. Thanks. I was real happy you came
along.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
And... I was happy with what you said
back there, too. Thanks.
<PAGE>
I like you too.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOVE>
Hey, don't smile like that! I'm taking
the cow home. You take care on your own
way back, okay?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Fine. I don't need your help. I think I
can catch one cow on my own.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I'd better get moving. See you later.
